ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jon plans to propose marriage to Tarot but before he can pop the question, the engagement ring is stolen by zombie hula dancers! Meanwhile Tarot and Raven Hex face a different set of Jaws from the Deep! Will Tarot accept Jon's proposal if he recovers the ring?
*Notes:* The main cover is a homage of the movie poster for Jaws.
